questions.amount: How much blood has been lost? (soaked through how many towels/bandages)
questions.duration: How long has the bleeding continued?
questions.cause: What caused the bleeding? (trauma, spontaneous, medical procedure)
questions.medications: Are you taking blood thinners or aspirin?
questions.control_measures: Have you been able to control the bleeding with pressure?

triage_rules.expression: 'no' in str(control_measures).lower() and ('large' in str(amount).lower() or 'soaked' in str(amount).lower())
triage_rules.reason: Uncontrolled severe bleeding - Immediate Emergency Care Required - Apply direct pressure
Uncontrolled bleeding on anticoagulants - Emergency care required
